name: Doka 2 Trade
description:
Doka 2 Trade is a unique game about the confrontation between schoolchildren and zombies. In the ruthless and harsh world of Doka 2, the player has to choose a side for himself.
Will you be a bloodthirsty, strong zombie or a small but dexterous schoolboy? Each of them uses a special Kusaymer weapon, which is located in the secret military store Sixeroch. This allows you to suspend the birth of enemies and inflict bites on those that have already appeared. Can you bite until you defeat a crowd of enemies?
You have to explore the Schools where enemies are born and try to stop them.

Features

  • Unique voice acting from the developer
  • Role selection
  • Moderately challenging gameplay
